reviews.text: Although an older property, the owners have updated rooms, new TV, very comfortable beds, entire place kept clean and tidy. Staff is friendly, helpful and professional. Access is easy from the freeways.
reviews.title: Nice place to stay

reviews.text: the neighbor hood is good and i feel safe here. there are plenty of good places to eat near buy a costco as well. i can find everything i need in a short distance. in the summer time the pool and spa are a good plus
reviews.title: close to stores i need when doing business in the LA area

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We planned our LA trip and because we were travel between LA downtown and Anaheim so we decided to stay at this hotel in between the two locations. Location is just nice, not too far from LA downtown and not too far from Anaheim, just in between. Because we preferred to have dinner in Hollywood downtown after visit the park, this is the nice location for us.
reviews.title: Just meet the standard of Best Western Inn

reviews.text: My biggest gripe I will give to a hotel is the noise between neighbors. I don't want to hear my neighbor cough, talk on his cell phone, have sex, or hear what TV show he's listening too. This is what we had here. The "sharing" door between rooms (in case we wanted two joined room doors) gave no buffer at all, the walls seemed fine, but we heard all sorts of noise like the occupants where hanging at their shared door and the TV was right next to the door, etc. Beds were comfortable. Room was clean. Check in was fast. Desk staff were pleasant. However, I would not stay here again, just because of the noise. I marked down sleep quality only because the neighbor listened to TV until 2 am and up at 5 am, so then we were woken too.
reviews.title: Neighbor Noise

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I'm in long distance relationship with my boyfriend and we stay at this hotel whenever I visit to just get away so we get our privacy and aren't always surrounded by family and friends 24/7. One thing I absolutely love about this hotel is how roomy and spacious they are. I've been to quite a few hotels and I swear the newer they are, the smaller the rooms get. I don't feel like I'm in any tight space with a load of furniture everywhere. I've probably stayed here at this hotel about five times and the fives room I've been in have been consistently spacious. The only thing I find annoying is that the last time I stayed there (in November) I accidentally forgot to pack my iPad into my luggage and left it on the table in the room. We checked out and didn't realize it until a few hours later. I didn't receive any phone call or anything that I had left my iPad. They had my cell phone number. I honestly didn't appreciate the fact they couldn't call. I had to be the one too. What if I never called? would they have kept my iPad this whole entire time? Other than that, I've alway enjoyed my stay at this hotel. I just booked another room for next weekend(:
reviews.title: Clean, nice, ROOMY and inexpensive.

reviews.text: Overall this hotel was very clean. Though when I went to ask for another night, the older woman at the desk asked me not to yell at the housekeeping maids through the window. At first I just thought she was letting everyone know, then she told me her maids said I was rude for yelling through the window and next time to open the door. I told her they probably had the wrong room because we had been gone all day. I let her know that we didn't receive any towels like I had asked and she continued to tell me that it was because we didn't open the door. I tried to explain one more time that it couldn't possibly have been us because we were not there. After all that, I was then charged twice for a roll away bed when it should have only been once. A second woman helped me out with that and was really polite and apologetic about it. But the older woman, rude!
reviews.title: Clean, nice, inexpensive, but felt disrespected by older woman at front desk and housekeeping.

reviews.text: We found the staff exceptionally helpful at this hotel, the room clean and quiet even though on a main road, and the continental breakfast full of many choices- cereal, toast, bagels, yoghurt, fruit, juice and more! We would definitely recommend this hotel to any one looking to stay in this area- excellent value and service at a reasonable price!
reviews.title: Friendly, clean and great breakfast
Just a room
reviews.text: Dont exept too much. Rooms are ok but we had a bad smell in the room. If you sleep on the first floor Consider hear who's going upstairs.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There is nothing around without car around the neighborhood, for a place to put your head for one night is fine.
reviews.title: Very good Hotel!

reviews.text: This hotel is very good for the price! Staff is helpful, room was well cleaned everyday and breakfast was awesome. Location is excellent, close to all freeways and within a good driving distance from L.A. top attractions! I would definitely stay again!
reviews.title: Good for price
My impressions
reviews.text: This hotel was very convienient to our final destination. We traveled from the central coast and this was a half way stop to the palm desert area. I was very pleased with all aspects of this hotel.I would recommend this hotel to anyone traveling through the Los Angeles area. Freeway access is excellent and accomidations were above average for the rate charged.
